sentence.Network_en: The magazine will desist from such language after receiving complaints.
sentence.Network_cn: 杂志接到投诉之后将杜绝使用此类语言。

sentence.Network_en: They agreed to desist from the bombing campaign.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们同意停止大规模轰炸。

PerfectNetExp.abs: maladroit的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... vanguard 前锋, 先锋, 先驱... desist 停止, 控制, 断念... enzyme 酶.
高级英语单词 - 豆丁网 ... contemptible 鄙视的，不齿的 desist 停止，打消念头 diphtheria 白喉.
The judge told the man to desist from threatening his wife ., 法官告诫那男子切莫再去威胁其妻.
sort 种、类、型desist 停止、断念neglect 疏忽、忽略

list.abs: You had better desist ., 你最好打消念头吧.
To desist or fail in doing ; forbear ., 停止做或不能做 , 避免.
a study of special desistance state of potential damage offence ., 危险犯之特殊中止形态研究.
Seeing the boss coming , they desist from gossiping ., 见老板来了 , 他们停止了闲谈.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desister, from Latin desistere, from de- 'down from' + sistere 'to stop' (reduplication of stare 'to stand')

entry.def: If you desist from doing something, you stop doing it.

example.ex: Ford never desisted from trying to persuade him to return to America...
example.tran: 福特从未停止过劝说他返回美国。

example.ex: The magazine will desist from such language after receiving complaints...
example.tran: 杂志接到投诉之后将杜绝使用此类语言。

auth_sentence.content: Otherwise, desist from making such radical political charges!
auth_sentence.res_content: Otherwise, desist from making such radical political charges!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Otherwise, desist from making such radical political charges!

auth_sentence.content: Only God can make them desist from such decision.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only God can make them desist from such decision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only God can make them desist from such decision.

auth_sentence.content: How can I desist from such an interesting hobby?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can I desist from such an interesting hobby?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can I desist from such an interesting hobby?

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

sentences.en: I asked him to desist from abusing me in private to newspaper editors.
sentences.cn: 我要求他停止私下向各报馆编辑诽谤我。
